tiles.title: Amber Alert Details
tiles.query:
AlertsMaster //AlertsMaster_Latest
| summarize arg_max(CreationTimeStamp, IsActive) by AlertId, LicensePlateNo
| extend NewAlertId = iff(AlertId==202110152,202110142,AlertId)
| extend MapTracker=strcat("https://dataexplorer.azure.com/dashboards/09a1134e-090a-48d7-88ae-5ebe9de25e5a?_startTime=", _startTime,"&_endTime=", _endTime,"&_alertID=",NewAlertId,"#90f86729-641e-44c0-b6f3-73517726ca9e")
| project AlertId, LicensePlateNo, CreationTimeStamp, IsActive=iff(IsActive, "Yes", "No"), MapTracker
| where _onlyActive =="No" or _onlyActive =="Yes" and IsActive =="Yes"
| sort by IsActive

tiles.title: Location on Map
tiles.query:
MatchedAlerts
| extend ReportedTime = tostring(CapturedTimestamp)
| where Latitude > 0
| where AlertId == _alertID or _alertID =='All'
| project ReportedTime, Longitude, Latitude,1
| render piechart with (kind=map)

## LuK Amber Alert Dashboard
The **LuK Amber Alert Dashboard** displays information about Amber Alerts in the region. LuK is a crowdsourcing application on a car dashboard device and when activated, it helps drivers automatically look out for vehicles with license plate number that matches the one in the Amber Alert.  Using **“LuK”**, the dashboard provides authorities with valuable geolocation information about the vehicle involved in the Amber Alert. 
- You can use the dashboard parameters to filter for an alert by ID, or filter to all active alerts;
- You can also use the Amber alert map tracker to see all notifications related to an alert.

dataSource.query:
AlertsMaster_Latest
| project tostring(AlertId)
| union (print 'All' | project AlertId=print_0)
